Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Votes.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Title: Relates to requiring DVS to provide the division's copy of the veteran's DD-214 form to the appropriate county veterans' service agency upon the release of veterans from service
Summary: Requires the division of veterans' services to provide the division's copy of the veteran's DD-214 form to the appropriate county veterans' service agency upon the release of veterans from service.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the division of veterans' services responsibilities to the appropriate county veterans' service agency upon the release of veterans from service
